name: audio
title: Audio
description: Track player components for other extensions to utilize. NOTE: Lock screen controls will not be visible in the preview.
releaseNotes:
Release notes
* (New) Users can now choose repeat mode for their current active audio source, from within audio modal
* Artwork placeholder image has been updated
* Playing track will now provide more accurate visual for loading state
* Fixed blank screen when opening audio modal, if Podcast episode is playing

For developers
* Improved default audio behavior within hooks
